body_html:
Note that the source of truth for an explanation of this algorithm is here:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp#L769

It's a little janky to add these calculation kernel to CuTorch, because its so heavily tied to the PyTorch advanced indexing logic, but here we are.

body:
Note that the source of truth for an explanation of this algorithm is here:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp#L769

It's a little janky to add these calculation kernel to CuTorch, because its so heavily tied to the PyTorch advanced indexing logic, but here we are.
